fullText:
Great read for AI devs.

(bookmark it)

LLM agents are slow.

The bottleneck in complex agentic systems today is the planning part.

Plan generation alone can take 25+ seconds for task requests.

This compounds fast at scale. Real-world dataset analysis shows about 30% of https://t.co/5bs6nzimce
